textBox.richText: New paper on fusion of Anti-Spoofing

New paper accepted for publication at CVPR 2013 Workshop on Biometrics: I. Chingovska, A. Anjos, and S. Marcel. Anti-spoofing in action: joint operation with a verification system. In IEEE Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition - Workshop on Biometrics (CVPR), 2013. Pdf: http://publications.idiap.ch/downloads/papers/2013/Chingovska_CVPRWORKSHOPONBIOMETRICS_2013.pdf Source code: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/antispoofing.fusion_faceverif/1.0 Data: https://www.idiap.ch/dataset/replayattack Congratulations to Ivana.
New paper on fusion of Anti-Spoofing at CVPR 2013 Workshop on Biometrics
